description.english: Solve the piano puzzle on your own.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme du piano par vous-même.
description.italian: Risolvi il puzzle del pianoforte da solo.
description.japanese: ピアノのパズルを自力で解いてください。
description.portuguese: Resolva o enigma do piano sozinho.
description.spanish: Resuelve el rompecabezas del piano por ti mismo.

description.english: Solve the chess puzzle on your own.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme des échecs par vous-même.
description.italian: Risolvi il puzzle degli scacchi da solo.
description.japanese: チェスのパズルを自力で解いてください。
description.portuguese: Resolva o enigma do xadrez sozinho.
description.spanish: Resuelve el rompecabezas de ajedrez por ti mismo.

displayName.japanese: 少し塩が多すぎたかな

description.english: Get the ending by drinking the contents of the bowl.
description.french: Obtenez la fin en buvant le contenu du bol.
description.german: Erhalte das Ende, indem du den Inhalt der Schale trinkst.
description.italian: Ottieni il finale bevendo il contenuto della ciotola.
description.japanese: ボウルの中身を飲んでエンディングを取得します。
description.portuguese: Obtenha o final bebendo o conteúdo da tigela.
description.schinese: 喝下碗中的内容来获得结局。
description.spanish: Consigue el final bebiendo el contenido del cuenco.
description.turkish: Kasenin içeriğini içerek sonu elde edin.

description.english: Get the ending by banishing the ghost.
description.french: Obtenez la fin en exorcisant le fantôme.
description.german: Erhalte das Ende, indem du den Geist verbannst.
description.italian: Ottieni il finale esorcizzando il fantasma.
description.japanese: 幽霊を追い払ってエンディングを取得します。
description.portuguese: Obtenha o final ao exorcizar o fantasma.
description.spanish: Consigue el final exorcizando al fantasma.

description.english: Solve the note puzzle without using hints.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme de la note sans utiliser d'indices.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma della nota senza usare suggerimenti.
description.japanese: ヒントを使わずにメモの謎を解いてください。
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 메모 퍼즐을 해결하세요.
description.polish: Rozwiąż zagadkę z notatką bez używania wskazówek.
description.portuguese: Resolva o enigma da nota sem usar dicas.
description.russian: Решите загадку с запиской не используя подсказки
description.schinese: 不使用提示解开笔记谜题。
description.spanish: Resuelve el rompecabezas de la nota sin usar pistas.

description.english: Get the ending by putting the ghost’s soul to rest.
description.french: Obtenez la fin en apaisant l'âme du fantôme.
description.german: Erhalte das Ende, indem du die Seele des Geistes zur Ruhe bringst.
description.italian: Ottieni il finale facendo riposare l'anima del fantasma.
description.japanese: 幽霊の魂を安らかにし、エンディングを取得します。
description.koreana: 유령의 영혼을 평화롭게 해주고 엔딩을 얻으세요.
description.portuguese: Obtenha o final fazendo a alma do fantasma descansar.
description.schinese: 使幽灵的灵魂得到安息来获得结局。
description.spanish: Consigue el final descansando el alma del fantasma.
description.turkish: Hayaletin ruhunu huzura kavuşturarak sonu elde edin.
